titles.title: Reinvigorating American Energy Infrastructure Act
A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to provide that certain coal-fired power plants are eligible for loan guarantees, and for other purposes.
Reinvigorating American Energy Infrastructure Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Reinvigorating American Energy Infrastructure Act
This bill expands eligibility for the Department of Energy's loan guarantee program for advanced fossil energy technology projects to include certain high efficiency, low emissions coal-fired power plants.
